net.codemusic.smartears.event
Interface IScoreEventManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventManager
public interface IScoreEventManager

This interface represents a class that is responsible for registering, unregistering, and propogating ScoreEvents to ScoreListeners

Method Summary
 void addScoreListener(ScoreListener listener)
          Registers a ScoreListener
 void processCorrectEvent(ScoreEvent e)
          Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their correct(ScoreEvent e) method
 void processIncorrectEvent(ScoreEvent e)
          Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their incorrect(ScoreEvent e) method
 void processRepeatEvent(ScoreEvent e)
          Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their repeat(ScoreEvent e) method
 void processResetEvent(ScoreEvent e)
          Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their reset(ScoreEvent e) method
 void removeScoreListener(ScoreListener listener)
          Unregisters a ScoreListener
 

Method Detail

addScoreListener

public void addScoreListener(ScoreListener listener)
Registers a ScoreListener

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register. This listener will be notified of all ScoreEvents

removeScoreListener

public void removeScoreListener(ScoreListener listener)
Unregisters a ScoreListener

Parameters:
listener - the listener to unregister. This listener will no longer be notified of ScoreEvents

processCorrectEvent

public void processCorrectEvent(ScoreEvent e)
Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their correct(ScoreEvent e) method

processIncorrectEvent

public void processIncorrectEvent(ScoreEvent e)
Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their incorrect(ScoreEvent e) method

processResetEvent

public void processResetEvent(ScoreEvent e)
Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their reset(ScoreEvent e) method

processRepeatEvent

public void processRepeatEvent(ScoreEvent e)
Propogates a ScoreEvent to all registered ScoreListeners by calling their repeat(ScoreEvent e) method
